.. _changes:

*************
Change Log
*************

.. module:: famafrench
   :noindex:
.. currentmodule:: famafrench

Version 0 (Beta)
################

Release 0.1.3
=============
Initial release as of May 5, 2020.


Release 0.1.4
=============
Current release as of May 12, 2020.
   
   - Fixed logical error that improperly computed the `average` (equal-weighted) size of firms for a portfolio:
     June ``ME`` - which is used to sort portfolios - was used instead of the current period's market value of equity ``ME``.
